steps.title: DFID Project Information XML download meeting the IATI standard
steps.description: These XML downloads about aid projects from the Department for International Development meet the standard set by the International Aid Transparency Initiative

output_representation.description: Country information about aid projects funded by the Department for International Development.
Regional information about aid projects funded by the Department for International Development.
Non-geographic information about aid projects funded by the Department for International Development.

steps.title: Exhibit Interface onto IATI Data
steps.description: A tool for browsing IATI Data in an interactive way. Explore spending on a map, in a table or on a timeline. Includes Google Visualisation of locations and spend over time.

process.description: Using Exhibit to visualise data in an interactive way

comments.id: Every step should be identified by it's URI
comments.artifact_type: Artifact types re-use CURIE IDs for types of things where available e.g. dcat:Dataset, doap:Project. Where not available, we will define our own (e.g. odw:visualization, odw:mashUp)
